about.metaDescription: Toollite is a free online utility collection for developers and general users, including text tools, case converters, JSON formatters, and PDF tools.
about.metaKeywords: Toollite, online tools, text tools, JSON formatter, PDF merge, free utilities, developer tools
about.title: About This Site
about.whatIsBody: Toollite is a free online utility collection for developers, planners, and general users. It provides frequently used tools such as text cleaner, case converter, JSON formatter, and PDF merge directly in your browser. Use it quickly and safely without installation.
about.toolsBody: Currently we provide text cleaner (remove spaces and line breaks), case converter, JSON formatter/minifier, and PDF merge. More tools will be added continuously. All tools run on the client side and your input is never sent to or stored on a server.
about.targetBody: Anyone who works with code or documents such as developers, marketers, and office workers. Personal and business use is free, but commercial redistribution or unauthorized copying of the tools is prohibited.
about.contactBody: For bug reports, feature requests, or privacy-related questions, please use the public channels shown on the site (e.g. GitHub issues, contact info). The privacy policy is available on a separate page.

privacy.metaDescription: Toollite privacy policy. Information on collected data, usage purposes, third-party sharing, cookies, and access logs.
privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.section1Body: Toollite ("site") values your personal information and complies with applicable privacy laws such as the Personal Information Protection Act. This policy explains what information we collect on the site, how we use it, how it is stored and deleted, and your rights as a user.
privacy.section2Intro: To provide and improve our services, we may collect the following types of information:
privacy.section2Item1: Access logs: IP address, browser type, access time, referrer URL
privacy.section2Item2: Usage environment: device type, screen resolution (aggregated anonymously via analytics tools)
privacy.section2Item3: Text and files you input when using the tools: not stored on the server and processed only within the session.
privacy.section3Item1: Providing the service, fixing errors, and ensuring stability
privacy.section3Item2: Analyzing access statistics and usage patterns (anonymized and aggregated)
privacy.section3Item3: Improving the service and planning new features
privacy.section4Body: The site may use the following third-party services for analytics and advertising. How each service collects and uses data is governed by that provider's own privacy policy.
privacy.section5Body: Cookies are used to improve convenience and analyze service usage. You can restrict the use of cookies in your browser settings, but some features may not work properly if cookies are disabled.
privacy.section6Body: Access logs and similar data are retained for the period required by law or for service operation and are then deleted. Text and files you input when using the tools are not stored on the server and are not retained after you leave the page.
privacy.section7Body: You may request inquiries, access, correction, or deletion regarding your personal information. For such requests, please use the contact information provided on the About page.
privacy.section8Body: If this privacy policy changes, we will post a notice on the site, and in case of significant changes we will indicate the updated date.
